coderanch-animations.description: RedM Animation Menu Created by CodeRanch Team
changelog: Config option added to enable/disable sit prompts on chairs.
Added /sit command to use instead of showing prompts on chairs.
Config option added to enable/disable the left image on the UI.
Config option to directly play animations instead of going through animpos.
/stopduo command added to stop duo animations.
Issue with menu not properly closing fixed.
